name: Nintendo Kit Game ROM File
summary: Learn about .NKIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The NKIT format was developed to reduce the size of ISO files that store an exact, uncompressed 1:1 copy of a Wii or Gamecube game, which can grow to be very large in size. You can convert ISO files to NKIT files with NKit. You can also convert NKIT files back to ISO files with NKit.
NOTE: Downloading NKIT files containing Wii or Gamecube games is illegal. You should only dump Wii or Gamecube games from discs that you own.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
